name: Night Time (Jehoiakim)
description:
Night Time Trailer

Night time is a first-person horror-adventure with puzzles and some action elements.

This story is about a teenager named Jackson who went home early in the morning, only to find out that no one's home. Whenever a person's alone at home, a dark mysterious presence will follow you.

----- IF THE GAME STUCK IN TOWN RE DOWNLOAD THE GAME FILE --------

Esc Key - Pause

WASD Key - Move

F Key - Pick up Item

E Key - Examine or Interact

Left Control - Crouch

Left Mouse Button - Pick Up Item Inside The Object

Right Mouse Button - Zoom

Requirements:

Minimum

OS: Windows 7,8,10

Memory: 4GB RAM

Graphics Card: Vega 8 graphics

Storage: 2GB

Recommended:

OS: Windows 7,8,10

Memory: 5GB RAM

Graphics Card: Nvidia GT 730

Storage: 2GB

Features:

Puzzles:

You will be able to collect and examine objects.

Horror Atmosphere:

The game is inspired by the atmosphere of Hellseed, with jump scares.

#puzzle #horror #action #adventure #other #strategy
